emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom Russell D. Jackson Jr., fourth from left, and bride La Verne C. Edwards Jackson wearing gown with full four tiered lace skirt, posed with wedding party including Dayrene Edwards, Shernell Edwards, Gayle Washington, Charles Jones, LeRoy Norris, and Wesley Gibson, in front of altar of St. James AMEZ Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 20, 1962, pg. A13 reads:" Leaving Church - Mr. and Mrs. Russell D. Jackson Jr. smile happily as they leave St. James AME Church, following their recent wedding. The bride is the former LaVerne C. Edwards, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harry S. Edwards. - Harris Photo."
